function.name: getItemsInPath
function.description: Returns all files and folders inside a given directory path.

path.description: Path to get the items from

function.name: createFile
function.description: creates new empty file or overrides pre-existing one into an empty one

function.name: writeIntoFile
function.description: Writes content into a file unless it is forbidden and will create file if file doesn't exist

content.description: Content to write into the file.

function.name: readFile
function.description: Reads and returns the full contents of a file.

function.name: delete
function.description: Deletes a file at the specified path.

function.name: createDirectory
function.description: Creates a new directory at the specified path.

function.name: deleteDirectory
function.description: Deletes a directory at the specified path.

function.name: moveFile
function.description: Moves a file from source path to destination path.

function.name: copyFile
function.description: Copies a file from source path to destination path.

function.name: getCurrentDirectory
function.description: Returns the current working directory path.

function.name: runCommand
function.description: Runs a shell command and returns its output. Do not resort to this function unless absolutely necessary. You must get user confirmation before running any command.

function.name: fileExists
function.description: Checks if a file exists at the specified path.

function.name: getFileSize
function.description: Returns the size of a file in bytes.

file.description: File path to get the size of.

function.name: readPDF
function.description: Reads and returns the text content of a PDF file.

function.name: renameFile
function.description: Renames a file from old name to new name. Must include full path in both file and new name.

source.description: The full path of the source file.

new_name.description: The new full path of the file.

function.name: rememberFact
function.description: Remembers a fact by storing it in memory.

key.description: The key associated with the fact.

function.name: recallFact
function.description: Recalls a fact from memory using its associated key.

key.description: The key associated with the fact to be recalled.

function.name: forgetFact
function.description: Forgets a fact from memory using its associated key.

key.description: The key associated with the fact to be forgotten.

function.name: listMemories
function.description: Lists all keys of the facts currently stored in memory.

function.name: searchWeb
function.description: Searches the web using DuckDuckGo and returns the top k results with titles and links. Use this to find information online.

query.description: The search query to look up on the web.

k.description: Number of results to return (default is 3).

function.name: extractTextFromUrl
function.description: Extracts the main text content from a webpage URL using a headless browser. Use this after searchWeb to read the actual content of a page.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to extract text from.

function.name: addVectorMemory
function.description: Adds a piece of information to vector memory for later retrieval based on similarity.

text.description: The piece of information to be added to vector memory.

function.name: queryVectorMemory
function.description: Queries vector memory for information similar to the given query text and returns the most relevant pieces of information.

query.description: The query text to search for in vector memory.

k.description: Number of relevant pieces of information to return (default is 3).
